page.title: 19SCHOOLS
page.content: THE AREA HAS A LOW DENSITY OF POPULATION AND THUS SCHOOLS FOR THE CHILDREN OF THE AREA ARE SOME DISTANCE FROM THEIR HOMES.THE CHILDREN BEGIN IN SMALL RURAL PRIMARY SCHOOLS AT {GREAT {ELLINGHAM }OR {ROCKLANDS.}GREAT ELLINGHAM HAS ABOUT 130 ON ROLL AND ROCKLANDS 50.AT 11 THE CHILDREN TRANSFER TO {ATTLEBOROUGH HIGH SCHOOL OR TO ANOTHER SCHOOL OF THE PARENTS' CHOICE.THERE IS A PRIVATE GRAMMAR SCHOOL IN THETFORD. TWO ISSUES DOMINATE THE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS OF THE AREA.THE FIRST OF THESE IS THE FUTURE OF THE VILLAGE SCHOOL WHICH IS SEEN AS UNECONOMIC BY THE L.E.A. AND THE FUTURE OF ROCKLANDS SCHOOL MUST BE IN SOME DOUBT ALTHOUGH ,AT THE PRESENT,ONLY SCHOOLS WITH A ROLE BELOW 30 ARE BEING CONSIDERED FOR CLOSURE.ARGUEMENTS ARE BASED ON ECONOMICS RATHER THAN QUALITY.
